@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Also, I suggest looking into an IDE i.e: Eclipse, it helps you with resolving errors/programming. You can search guides up on youtube, however using it is rather self explanatory.

item.title: Class, interface or enum expected error
item.dc:creator: @saciid.1 saciid.1
item.description:
@saciid.1 wrote:

So I tried coding and adding dice to my server then I got this error:

The code I was trying to add to the ClickItem.java was:

if (itemId == 15084) { //Dice Bag ID for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 5000) { c2.sendMessage("" +c.playerName+" has rolled a "+ Misc.random(100) +" with their dice!"); c.startAnimation(ID HERE); c.gfx0(ID HERE); } } } }

Read full topic
